original_title: Planet Galata - A Bridge in Itsanbul
overview: Galata Bridge is a world famous bridge in Istanbul. More than 120.000 people cross this bridge every day. The bridge has two floors and is home to many restaurants and shops. For many people the bridge is center of their life. Some even live on the bridge.  Planet Galata is a portrait of these people â€“ and a portrait of the bridge.
title: Planet Galata - A Bridge in Itsanbul
